content:
## n8n@1.31.1 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@1.31.0...n8n@1.31.1) for this version.
**Release date:** 2024-03-06 /// warning | Breaking changes Please note that this version contains a breaking change. HTTP connections to the editor will fail on domains other than localhost. You can read more about it [here](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/blob/master/packages/cli/BREAKING-CHANGES.md#1320). /// This is a bug fix release and it contains a breaking change. For full release details, refer to [Releases](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/releases) on GitHub.
